gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 134, Spurs 101
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics have now won six consecutive games as they defeat the Spurs, 134-101. Jayson Tatum led the way for the Celtics with 25 points and six rebounds.  Jaylen Brown (24 points, six rebounds and three assists) and Derrick White (17 points and five assists) combined for 41 points. Victor Wembanyma scored 21 points along with seven rebounds in the losing effort. The Celtics  improved to 26-6 on the year. San Antonio moves to 5-27 with the loss.
